mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, book_code, res_id, res_day, res_pick, user_seq, book_name, res_ing, lib_name FROM ( SELECT book_code, res_id, res_day, res_pick, user_seq, book_name, (res_pick - res_day) as res_ing, l.lib_name FROM user_res r JOIN li_book USING(book_code) JOIN book USING(book_isbn) LEFT OUTER JOIN library l ON l.lib_id = r.lib_id WHERE user_seq = #{user_seq} ORDER BY res_id desc )) WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
SELECT count(*) cnt FROM user_res WHERE user_seq = #{user_seq}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT rownum as rnum, loan_seq, book_code, user_seq, book_name, loan_date, loan_ing, loan_return, loan_ex, isOver, lib_name FROM ( SELECT loan_seq, book_code, user_seq, book_name, loan_date, loan_ing, loan_return, loan_ex, (loan_ex - loan_return) as isOver, l.lib_name FROM user_loan u JOIN li_book USING(book_code) JOIN book USING(book_isbn) LEFT OUTER JOIN library l ON l.lib_id = u.lib_id WHERE user_seq = #{user_seq} ORDER BY loan_date DESC )) WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
SELECT count(*) cnt FROM user_loan WHERE user_seq = #{user_seq}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT rownum as rnum, loan_seq, book_code, user_seq, book_name, loan_date, loan_return, over_date, user_pass, lib_name FROM ( SELECT loan_seq, book_code, user_seq, book_name, loan_date, loan_return, (loan_return - loan_ex) as over_date, loan_return + (loan_return - loan_ex) as user_pass, l.lib_name FROM user_loan u JOIN li_book USING(book_code) JOIN book USING(book_isbn) LEFT OUTER JOIN library l ON l.lib_id = u.lib_id WHERE loan_return - loan_ex > 0 AND user_seq = #{user_seq} ORDER BY loan_date DESC )) WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM user_loan JOIN li_book USING(book_code) JOIN book USING(book_isbn) WHERE loan_return - loan_ex > 0 AND user_seq = #{user_seq}
